title: Upgrade Customer to VIP Loyalty Tier
description: A customer's spending has reached the threshold to be upgraded to the VIP tier of the loyalty program.

tasks.description: A system process identifies customers whose annual spending has exceeded the VIP threshold.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system flags the customer for a tier upgrade.

tasks.description: The system automatically updates the customer's loyalty status from 'Standard' to 'VIP'.
The system sends an email to the customer congratulating them on reaching the VIP tier and explaining their new benefits (e.g., free shipping).
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is notified of their new status and benefits, increasing engagement.
